data.meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.
data.sentence: The word رَبِّهِ comes from the root ر ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.

data.meanings: Sought for or after, desired, endeavored to find and take and get (good or evil)Loving or affecting a thingActing wrongfully, injuriously or tyrannicallySeeking or endeavoring to act corruptingly, wrongly and/or unjustly, insolent/disobedientExceeding due bounds or just limits in any wayNot right, proper or fitProstitute or adulteress, unchaste [e.g. 19:20, 19:28, 24:33]Not seeking what one should not seekSeeking game or preyPlace where a thing is sought, way or manner in which a thing is sought
data.sentence: The word ابْتِغَاءَ comes from the root ب غ ي and is associated with the meanings: Sought for or after, desired, endeavored to find and take and get (good or evil)Loving or affecting a thingActing wrongfully, injuriously or tyrannicallySeeking or endeavoring to act corruptingly, wrongly and/or unjustly, insolent/disobedientExceeding due bounds or just limits in any wayNot right, proper or fitProstitute or adulteress, unchaste [e.g. 19:20, 19:28, 24:33]Not seeking what one should not seekSeeking game or preyPlace where a thing is sought, way or manner in which a thing is sought

data.meanings: to face/encounter/confront, face, will, course/purpose/object one is pursuing, place/direction one is going/looking, way of a thing, consideration/regard.
data.sentence: The word وَجْهِ comes from the root و ج ه and is associated with the meanings: to face/encounter/confront, face, will, course/purpose/object one is pursuing, place/direction one is going/looking, way of a thing, consideration/regard.

data.meanings: to be high, elevated, lofty, exalted, ascend, overcome, be proud/upon/over, go up, rise in rank or dignity, raise, take up, mount, overtop.
data.sentence: The word الْأَعْلَى comes from the root ع ل و and is associated with the meanings: to be high, elevated, lofty, exalted, ascend, overcome, be proud/upon/over, go up, rise in rank or dignity, raise, take up, mount, overtop.
